attributes.action: make a statement to the nation to explain why English soldiers are being sent to be killed in Afghanistan and Iraq to ensure the right of the populations of those two countries to self determination yet he would deny those very same soldiers, if they survive their tour of duty, the right to vote on their own future by refusing to hold a referendum on further integration of their own country into the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
